segments.text: I am glad to meet you , Mr.Joey .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Mr . lie . I would like to discuss with you the feasibilities of establishing a joint venture with your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is excellent , your investment proposal is a wise decision . May I have some idea of your suggestion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest that we set up a board of directors for the management of the company and share rights and obligations as equal . That is very important .
segments.speaker: S2
